title: Do boardâ€™s financial expertise, age, ownership have influence on dividend policies? Evidence from kompas 100
abstract: This paper studies the relationship of board financial expertise, board age, and board ownership with dividend policy. Dividend policy will be measured using dividend payout ratio. In addition, it takes account three control variables: firm size, leverage, and return on asset. The subject of the study will be focused on firms that are listed in KOMPAS-100 Index Indonesia over the period of 2017-2019 (3 years). GRETL software is used for data analysis technique. Differing results have been found in Indonesian KOMPAS-100 Index. Board Financial Expertise and Board age have been found to have significant relationship towards the dividend policy. Nevertheless, the author found no correlation between board ownership and dividend policy.
contributors: Josua Tarigan (Advisor and Examination Committee); Saarce Elsye Hatane (Examination Committee 1); Foedjiawati, S.S., M.A., Ph.D. (Examination Committee 3)
